opendatalab/PDF-Extract-Kit

PDF content extraction toolkit

View on index

Related repos

  • benchmark dataset and tools for evaluating document parsing on diverse PDFs
  • python library for extracting text from PDFs, images, and docs
  • PDF processing toolkit for LLMs
  • AI tool for extracting structured data from PDFs
  • Converts PDFs into markdown with formulas and layout preservation
  • pure Python PDF splitting, merging, cropping, text extraction
  • extracts text and metadata from PDFs, Word, HTML, images, and more with fast Rust core and Python support
  • extracts text, math, and tables from academic PDFs
  • Cuts PDF files into pieces for Gemini AI Studio apps
